hb:RuleSetHist.hb:Revision: V1 : 2015-03-04 : Creation based on STD rule set V3 (2015-02-17) and CNES rule set V3 (2015-02-17) V1.1RC21 : 2015-07-16 : Update with examples, based on STD rule set V4 (2015-07-16) and CNES rule set V4 (2015-07-16) V1.1RC21 : 2015-12-07 : Based on STD rule set V4.1 (2015-11-18) and CNES rule set V4 (2015-07-16)
